snippet: The Chilean striker Alexis Sánchez, 25, ended his three-year stint at Barcelona by joining Arsenal for a fee of $60 million, adding some much-needed firepower to the English Premier League side.
abstract: Chilean striker Alexis Sanchez ends three-year stint at Barcelona by joining Arsenal for a fee of $60 million, adding much-needed firepower to English Premier League side; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Chilean striker Alexis Sánchez, 25, ended his three-year stint at Barcelona by joining Arsenal for a fee of $60 million, adding some much-needed firepower to the English Premier League side.

headline.main: Sánchez Agrees to Deal With Arsenal
